methods.name: scanDocument
methods.docs: Opens the device camera and starts the document scanning experience.

methods.name: getPluginVersion

tags.name: returns
tags.text: an Promise with version for this device

tags.name: throws
tags.text: An error if the something went wrong

methods.docs: Get the native Capacitor plugin version

properties.name: scannedImages
properties.docs: Scanned images in the requested response format.

properties.name: status
properties.docs: Indicates whether the scan completed or was cancelled.

properties.name: croppedImageQuality
properties.docs: Android only: quality of the cropped image from 0 - 100 (100 is best).

properties.name: letUserAdjustCrop
properties.docs:
Android only: allow the user to adjust the detected crop before saving.
Disabling this forces single-document capture.

properties.name: maxNumDocuments
properties.docs:
Maximum number of documents to scan.
On Android: limits documents the user can scan (1-24).
On iOS: prevents scanning more than the specified number of pages (uses internal API swizzling).
Set to 1 for single-scan mode where the scanner stops after one document.

properties.name: responseType
properties.docs: Format to return scanned images in (file paths or base64 strings).

properties.name: brightness
properties.docs:
Brightness adjustment applied to scanned images.
Range: -255 to 255 (0 = no change, positive = brighter, negative = darker)
Useful for compensating low-light scans.

properties.name: contrast
properties.docs:
Contrast adjustment applied to scanned images.
Range: 0.0 to 10.0 (1.0 = no change, >1 = more contrast, <1 = less contrast)
Helps improve text clarity in poorly lit scans.

properties.name: scannerMode
properties.docs:
Android only: scanner mode that controls ML Kit features and filters.
- 'base': Basic scan with crop/rotate, no filters or ML cleaning
- 'base_with_filter': Adds grayscale and auto-enhancement filters
- 'full': All features including ML-based image cleaning (erases stains, fingers, etc.)

members.name: Cancel
members.docs: The user cancelled the scan flow.

members.name: Base64
members.docs: Return scanned images as base64-encoded strings.

members.name: ImageFilePath
members.docs: Return scanned images as file paths on disk.

members.name: Base
members.docs:
Basic document scanning with crop and rotate features only.
No filters or ML-based enhancements.

members.name: BaseWithFilter
members.docs: Basic features plus automatic filters (grayscale, auto-enhancement).

members.name: Full
members.docs:
Full feature set including ML-based image cleaning.
Automatically removes stains, fingers, and other artifacts.
